item.title: Detecting USB Devices in Linux
item.description: I did buy a wifi donggle in Lazada but I didn’t know if it can be detected in my Raspberry pi using Rasbian. Command to use: lsusb. Example: root@raspberrypi:/home/pi# lsusb Bus 002 Device 001: ID 1d6b:0003 Linux Foundation 3.0 root hub Bus 001 Device 003: ID 148f:7601 Ralink Technology, Corp. MT7601U Wireless Adapter Bus 001 Device 004: ID 0000:3825 Bus 001 Device 002: ID 2109:3431 VIA Labs, Inc. Hub Bus 001 Device 001: ID 1d6b:0002 Linux Foundation 2.
